lead_paragraph: Tom Rowe's first two games in charge of an NHL team lasted longer than regulation, making him sweat it out to earn his first taste of success.

headline.print_headline: Barkov's Breakaway Gives Panthers 2-1 OT Win Over Red Wings
headline.main: Barkov's Breakaway Gives Panthers 2-1 OT Win Over Red Wings
